0: We stayed at The Conrad with a group of family and friends for 4 nights and it was just fantastic
it is close proximity to the beach made it so ideal to stroll down there for a swim or just to chill
EAT to your hearts content PRAY that you will be back and LOVE this place

The swimming pools are fabulous with a large central pool plus a pool that stretches around the hotel complex from one side to the other with a small sand beach area at each end it was always immaculately clean
We arranged for an Uber pick up and I think it was Juni who assisted us with the check out process in the lounge
The facilities and the staff at this hotel are great
The restaurants have super yummy food
very helpful and thoughtfullaundry service is good as well
This vacation trip I decided to try the suite room
We first visited in 205 and have returned every year since then
1: Good gesture but overall still left us with a frustrating bad experience of our final days in Bali so not happy overal We found the breakfast average compared to other Conrad properties we have stayed at in the past and also for Bali average having spent time at other 5 resorts
Prices were quite reasonable by American standards
Always enjoyed our stay but as the newer resorts are built there ’s a need to upgrade the Suites facilities
I hope you can help me because it ’s put shades on all brands
수질은 정말 안좋았음 너무 더러웠음 조식도 수쿠가 닫아서 스파이스에서 이용할수 있었음 너무 작은 조식당 린이 같은 정도를 제공한다면 차라리 린으로 가고 싶었음스파를 2번 이용해본 바 오이스크럽은 괜찮음 그러나 다른건
Tri in particular runs a smooth and pleasant ship in the restaurant he and his staff hit just the right balance between happily attending to your meal without interrupting the flow of conversation
That is only part of its charm you can walk out of the front door of the hotel and be part of the real local Bali
I was escorted room by Suaudi
Everything was realy expencive compared to other hotels in Bali
After two weeks I was still trying new things everyday
2: And when we entered the room for the first time the floor is not clean
The only frustrating part is I had to request housekeeping daily additional bath towels for my children
Canceled reservation because we got robbed and lost passports wallets and phones
The Balinese I encountered on this trip were such a kind and gentle people helping me in any way they could even if it were not in their own self interest
We happened to be staying while they were renovating some of the rooms meaning the hotel was a lot quieter than usual which was perfect for our romantic break
Might have been excusable if the restaurants were busy but they were not
One of the worst properties I have experienced
The executive lounge offers a traditional afternoon tea and a cocktail hours withe delicious canapes and bite produced by the chef in attendance
The only negative point for us was the beach really small dirty with algae and plastic
